Container.Name: Cal.com Prisma Studio
Container.Overview: The open-source Calendly alternative + Prisma Studio for database management
Container.Category: Cloud: Network:Privacy Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: calendso calendly calendar schedule prisma database studio orm
Container.Requires: Requires a separate PostgreSQL database container

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 5555

Config.Name: Web URL
Config.Description: The base URL for the webapp. Replace localhost with IP address

Config.Name: API URL
Config.Description: The base URL for the API. Replace localhost with IP address

Config.Name: Web Secret
Config.Description: Secret for the webapp. Use `openssl rand -base64 32` to generate.

Config.Name: CalDAV Secret
Config.Description: Secret for CalDAV. Use `dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1K count=1 | md5sum` to generate.

Config.Name: Email - From Header
Config.Description: Email address to use as the 'from' address in emails

Config.Name: Email - Host
Config.Description: SMTP server host

Config.Name: Email - Port
Config.Description: SMTP server port

Config.Name: Email - Username
Config.Description: SMTP server username

Config.Name: Email - Password
Config.Description: SMTP server password

Config.Name: Database URL
Config.Description: Connection URL for Postgres database

Config.Name: Database Direct URL
Config.Description: Use the same value as DATABASE_URL unless using connection pooler.

Config.Name: Accept License
Config.Description: Accept the license. More details: https://github.com/calendso/calendso/blob/main/LICENSE

Config.Name: Google API Credential JSON
Config.Description: Google API credential JSON

Config.Name: Office 365 - Client ID
Config.Description: MS Graph client ID for Office 365 and Outlook.com integration

Config.Name: Office 365 - Client Secret
Config.Description: MS Graph client secret for Office 365 and Outlook.com integration

Config.Name: Zoom - Client ID
Config.Description: Zoom client ID for Zoom integration

Config.Name: Zoom - Client Secret
Config.Description: Zoom client secret for Zoom integration

Config.Name: Override Authentication URL
Config.Description: Override the authentication URL

Config.Name: Disable Telemetry
Config.Description: 1 - Disable anonymous usage statistics

Config.Name: Environment
Config.Description: The environment the app is running in
